ygData.subject: RE: Decayed armor?
ygData.msgSnippet: If someone wants to do the math on it, I think you would actually have a better chance of winning the lottery then collecting all the pieces needed. As I see
ygData.messageBody:
If someone wants to do the math on it, I think you would actually have a
better chance of winning the lottery then collecting all the pieces needed.

As I see it there are two possible solutions to this. The first would be to
make the armor always drop from the Crusaders. I don't mind the random
spawns, in fact I find it preferable (Harder for higher lvls to farm the
stuff for Twinks, BTW does anybody know if the armor itself is NO Drop???).
The other method would be to remove the no drop restriction from Decaying
armor (this would cause item farming though).. Either way personally I find
it unacceptable now and don't think I'm going to go any further with the
quest.

On a complete side note which do you all prefer, A Lizzie Cloak or a White
Wolf Cloak?

Enjoy..



-----Original Message-----
From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu [mailto:countess_bathory_69@...]
Sent: Friday, October 15, 1999 10:30 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Decayed armor?


From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>

It is dropping..but it seems to be a 25% chance for a
drop..at least that has been our experience.
I personally have a Decayed Left Vambrace. A friend
has a Bracer.
Out of maybe 5 or 6 kills, those are the ony 2.
Another friend has killed about the same number and
got none.

As mentioned before this is worse than camping rubi.
Not only do they seem to be slow spawns, but the
decayed stuff is a semi-rare drop. AND you need
multiple pieces for each piece of SK armor. So since
all the drops are random, you may never see the second
part to the one you already have. And since they are
NO DROP, you cant trade with your friends.

What i am trying is offering cash for the location of
any crusader or for the looting rights to any decaying
armor. So far it hasnt worked. Too many SKs in the
zone who want it for themselves, but their are lots of
Rogues in their now. So i plan on holding any Raven
armor for ransom.

Back to the grind

--- Chip Paul <cpaul@...> wrote:
> Has anyone found any yet? I was in Cazic a while,
> and no crusaders
> dropped any. A guide told me to be patient, but I
> think they have to
> up that spawn rate a little, unless it is not
> loading at all.
>
> Xilith
>
>
